snippet: A special wish for us from Joe Krozel.
abstract: A special wish for us from Joe Krozel.
lead_paragraph: Administrivial Radio Appearance Alert! Will Shortz and I will be interviewed about puzzles and why people are so passionate about them on NPR's Colin McEnroe Show on Tuesday, February 14 from 1-2 p.m. Eastern. Will will be erudite, some guys with advanced degrees will be intelligent, and I will be providing the light entertainment. Hope you'll tune in!
